com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface FlavorableDescription<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Description<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaLibraryDescription, PrebuiltJarDescription

    public interface FlavorableDescription<T>
extends Description<T>
    Description that has flavors to register.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerFlavors(T arg, BuildRule describedRule, ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem, RuleKeyBuilderFactory ruleKeyBuilderFactory, TargetGraph targetGraph, BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver)
      Creates a BuildRule for each flavor for this Description.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.rules.Description

        createBuildRule, createUnpopulatedConstructorArg, getBuildRuleType

    • Method Detail

      • registerFlavors

        void registerFlavors(T arg,
                   BuildRule describedRule,
                   ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem,
                   RuleKeyBuilderFactory ruleKeyBuilderFactory,
                   TargetGraph targetGraph,
                   BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver)
        Creates a BuildRule for each flavor for this Description. Each BuildRule must be registered via the ruleResolver. Note that the BuildRule for a flavor will not be built unless it ends up in the transitive deps of the rules to be built.
        Parameters:
        arg - used to create the described rule.
        describedRule - rule being flavored: has not been registered with ruleResolver yet.
        projectFilesystem - available to help construct a BuildRuleParams.
        ruleKeyBuilderFactory - available to help construct a BuildRuleParams.
        targetGraph - used to create the action graph.
        ruleResolver - with which new flavors introduced by this method should be registered.
